name: Giuseppe Farina
introduction: Emilio Giuseppe "Nino" Farina (FAR-ee-NAH; 30 October 1906 in Turin, TO, Piedmont, Italy  30 June 1966 in Chambry, Savoie, Rhne-Alpes, France) was an Italian racing driver from Turin.  He is notable for winning the very first Formula One race and the season that it was part of, thus Farina is the first Formula One winner and the first Formula One World Champion.
